channel.title: Aragon DAO to MESG Integration: Milestone 2
channel.description:
The second milestone of our Aragon / MESG integration has been reached! We’ve built an Aragon application for connecting to webhooks.

This is a companion discussion topic for the original entry at https://blog.mesg.com/p/f296bff4-df21-4abc-a3e3-4998bd8a3901/
